channel.title: How would I make a loyalty point shop? [667]
channel.description:
Hey well Ive made myself loyalty points but how would I make it so that they can be used as a currency in a shop? Because usually to make shops you do like [shopId, currency, item, quantity] but i couldn't put the currency loyalty points in there so obviously its needed to be done in like shop.java or something??
Does anybody know how to do this? tl;dr: how do you make a shop that takes a currency that is not an item

item.title: How would I make a loyalty point shop? [667]
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Find the class that handles the shops, there should be the methods that take the money away and etc… Just make an exception for you shop number, to only take your loyalty points currency.

Read full topic
item.source: How would I make a loyalty point shop? [667]
